message.entry: Too many output arguments to RADON.
Expected input image I to be a 2-D non-sparse gpuArray with underlying class uint8, uint16, uint32, int8, int16, int32, logical, single or double.
I and THETA must be double.
Expected second input THETA to be a real, non-sparse vector gpuArray of underlying class double or a real, non-sparse, double vector.
Complex-valued gpuArray images are not supported for integer types.
